## Best College Football Teams in State of Florida (Last 10 Years)

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data <- read.csv("./Florida_CFB.csv")
f <- list(
  family = "Courier New, monospace",
  size = 18,
  color = "#7f7f7f"
)
x <- list(
  title = "Season",
  titlefont = f
)
y <- list(
  title = "Wins",
  titlefont = f
)

cfb <- plot_ly(data, x = data$Year, y = data$Wins, color = data$Team, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines') %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
cfb
```
